thread.title: Maryland basketball will meet Villanova in secret scrimmage on Oct. 31
thread.title_full: Maryland basketball will meet Villanova in secret scrimmage on Oct. 31

author: Roman Stubbs
title: Maryland basketball will meet Villanova in secret scrimmage on Oct. 31
text:
Maryland basketball will meet Villanova in secret scrimmage on Oct. 31 Resize Text By Roman Stubbs October 22 at 6:03 PM Follow @romanstubbs Maryland’s Melo Trimble. (Patrick Semansky/Associated Press) 
Maryland will travel to Villanova for a secret scrimmage on Oct. 31, a source confirmed on Thursday. 
The preseason game, which Maryland’s staff or athletic department can’t discuss per NCAA rules, will serve as the first tune-up ahead of a heavily anticipated schedule that gets underway on Nov. 13 against Mount St. Mary’s. Maryland also has an exhibition scheduled against South New Hampshire on Nov. 13. 
Maryland is ranked third in the USA Today coaches poll, while Villanova is ranked ninth. 
Maryland also played a secret scrimmage against Villanova two years ago in College Park, where Dez Wells reportedly hit a game-winning shot at the buzzer . The two schools initially had a meeting set in the 2014 Jimmy V Classic, but Maryland had to pull out because of “scheduling issues.” 
Here’s a complete list (subscription needed) of this season’s secret scrimmages, per ESPN’s Jeff Goodman. Roman Stubbs covers the University of Maryland athletics for The Washington Post. sports Success! Check your inbox for details. You might also like: Please enter a valid email address Sign Up
